message: Let's start with a fair, but slightly advantageous, offer for me. I'm confident we can reach a better deal later.
Alice, your offer was quite cheeky!  Let's be reasonable - I'm proposing a more balanced split this time.
Let's meet in the middle this time.  I'm willing to give up some ground, but I'm sure you can see the value in reaching an agreement now. The longer we wait, the less valuable this money becomes.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  The clock is ticking and the value is decreasing.  Meet me in the middle - this is my final offer.
